effect_entries.effect: Give to a scientist in the []{location:mining-museum} in []{location:oreburgh-city} or the Museum of Science in []{location:pewter-city} to receive a []{pokemon:shieldon}.
effect_entries.short_effect: Can be revived into a Shieldon.

flavor_text_entries.text:
大昔　地上で　暮らした
古代ポケモンの　カセキ。
襟飾りの　一部らしい。

A fossil from a prehistoric Pokémon
that once lived on the land. It looks to
be from some kind of protective collar.

Fossile di un Pokémon preistorico che viveva
sulla terraferma. Sembra far parte di un collare.

Fósil de un Pokémon prehistórico terrestre.
Parece ser parte de una protección ósea del
cuello.

Das Fossil eines uralten Pokémon, das an Land
lebte. Es sieht wie ein Schlüsselbein aus.

Le fossile d’un Pokémon préhistorique terrestre.
On dirait une partie d’un collier.

오랜 옛날 지상에서 살았던
고대 포켓몬의 화석.
깃 장식의 일부인 듯하다.

おおむかし　ちじょうで　くらした
こだい　ポケモンの　カセキ。
えりかざりの　いちぶ　らしい。

A fossil from a prehistoric Pokémon
that lived on the land. It appears to
be part of a collar.

that lived on the land. It appears to

terrestre. On dirait une partie d’un
collier.

that lived on the land. It appears to
